5namespace Doctrine\DBAL\Driver\API\OCI;
6
7use Doctrine\DBAL\Driver\API\ExceptionConverter as ExceptionConverterInterface;
8use Doctrine\DBAL\Driver\Exception;
9use Doctrine\DBAL\Driver\OCI8\Exception\Error;
10use Doctrine\DBAL\Driver\PDO\Exception as DriverPDOException;
11use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\ConnectionException;
12use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\DatabaseDoesNotExist;
13use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\DatabaseObjectNotFoundException;
14use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\DriverException;
15use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\ForeignKeyConstraintViolationException;
16use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\InvalidFieldNameException;
17use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\NonUniqueFieldNameException;
18use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\NotNullConstraintViolationException;
19use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\SyntaxErrorException;
20use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\TableExistsException;
21use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\TableNotFoundException;
22use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\TransactionRolledBack;
23use Doctrine\DBAL\Exception\UniqueConstraintViolationException;
24use Doctrine\DBAL\Query;
25
26use function assert;
27use function count;
28use function explode;
29use function str_replace;
30
31/** @internal */
32final class ExceptionConverter implements ExceptionConverterInterface
33{
34    /** @link http://www.dba-oracle.com/t_error_code_list.htm */
35    public function convert(Exception $exception, ?Query $query): DriverException
36    {
37        return match ($exception->getCode()) {
38            1,
39            2299,
40            38911 => new UniqueConstraintViolationException($exception, $query),
41            904 => new InvalidFieldNameException($exception, $query),
42            918,
43            960 => new NonUniqueFieldNameException($exception, $query),
44            923 => new SyntaxErrorException($exception, $query),
45            942 => new TableNotFoundException($exception, $query),
46            955 => new TableExistsException($exception, $query),
47            1017,
48            12545 => new ConnectionException($exception, $query),
49            1400 => new NotNullConstraintViolationException($exception, $query),
50            1918 => new DatabaseDoesNotExist($exception, $query),
51            2091 => (function () use ($exception, $query) {
52                //SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 2091 OCITransCommit: ORA-02091: transaction rolled back
53                //ORA-00001: unique constraint (DOCTRINE.GH3423_UNIQUE) violated
54                $lines = explode("\n", $exception->getMessage(), 2);
55                assert(count($lines) >= 2);
56
57                [, $causeError] = $lines;
58
59                [$causeCode] = explode(': ', $causeError, 2);
60                $code        = (int) str_replace('ORA-', '', $causeCode);
61
62                $sqlState = $exception->getSQLState();
63                if ($exception instanceof DriverPDOException) {
64                    $why = $this->convert(new DriverPDOException($causeError, $sqlState, $code, $exception), $query);
65                } else {
66                    $why = $this->convert(new Error($causeError, $sqlState, $code, $exception), $query);
67                }
68
69                return new TransactionRolledBack($why, $query);
70            })(),
71            2289,
72            2443,
73            4080 => new DatabaseObjectNotFoundException($exception, $query),
74            2266,
75            2291,
76            2292 => new ForeignKeyConstraintViolationException($exception, $query),
77            default => new DriverException($exception, $query),
78        };
79    }
80}
